reviewText: Very nice. Not as nice as the older iworship dvds. The first 7 had more scenery in the song videos. These are more of swirls and colors. This has a mixture of older songs and a few newer songs. Our older ones got scratched so I ordered this to try it. My kids love them, but prefer the scenery. If you don'y own own the older ones you will really enjoy it. Could be great for small groups or Sunday school.
I was very pleased with my order.  The music and the scenery are relaxing.  Pop the DVD and have a Worship Experience.
Good quality DVD - we use it for our Ladies Bible Study and it's good worship for that.
Awesome product... Great for small and large Bible study group settings!
Like the DVD and the quick mailing process
I liked the beautiful Christian songs.  I believe the song arrangements are truly gifted and spirit filled  . The downloading process was easy.
An uplifting and beautiful DVD.  Great for shut-ins and for worship at home or at Church.  I think these DVD's are a wonderful addition to worshipping the Lord.
